nas.nas_tips: Please $$$$Use the “GL.iNet” App $$$$ to browse and manage sharing files.
nas.shared_folder_tips: You can access your shared folders through the protocols you enabled.
nas.remove_all_share_caution: Are you sure you want to remove all shared folders?
nas.remove_share_caution: Are you sure you want to remove the shared folder?
nas.user_manage_tips: For some protocols (Samba/WebDAV), each shared folder can have independent user permissions set.
nas.remove_all_user_caution: Are you sure you want to remove all users?
nas.remove_user_caution: Are you sure you want to remove the user?
nas.eject_disk_caution: Are you sure you want to eject the disk? If someone is using files you shared, browsing, uploading, and downloading will break.
nas.no_disk_tips: Please insert the storage device first
nas.share_link_tips: The folder has been shared. Use the following link to mount the folder as a network disk to your PC or Phone. $$$$Setup Guide$$$$
nas.no_user_tips: Please select at least one writable user or read-only user.
